answers.answer: Um... I think that sounds like pre eclampsia. I sure hope youve gotten urself to the docs as its a life threatening condition for mums and bubs..GO. NOW!
Sign of preeclampsia. Go to er ASAP.
Yes definitely go get checked out now!!
Call your doctor or go to the hospital! The things you mentioned are all things my doctor told me to watch out for.
Sounds like dehydration to me. Suppose to drink about a gallon of water a day so make sure youre doing that.
Yea it does sound like preaclampsia. I had it with my first and that is serious. Get yourself checked out asap
Blood pressure. Get it checked ASAP

I have the same thing.... I see shiny spots in my vision. This is a sign of low blood pressure. When it happens, lay down immediately. This could cause you to pass out. Also, standing or sitting to quickly can cause the spots. Its very common during pregnancy

question: Hi, I'm 32 weeks pregnant and for the last 2 days I have been seeing stars not sure on what the real name for it is. Plus my eye sight has been getting a little blurry and I've been getting hit flashes and my hands are kinda shaky and I've had a headache for the last 2 day :). I'm not sure if this is something I should be worried about or if it just comes with the territory of being pregnant..
title: seeing stars
